name: Rats (CuriousRat)
description: Rats was developed by LocoPlacebo and CreasedPaper of CuriousRat Games. If you have any questions about this game, bugs to report, or want to know more information about what we have coming in the future, join the CuriousRat Discord server here. This game was made to try and learn how to implement multiplayer into games, so we really appreciate the feedback!
